#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,n,fib[90];
	cin>>t;
	fib[1]=1;
	fib[2]=1;
	for(int i=3;i<=90;i++)
	{
		fib[i]=(fib[i-1]+fib[i-2])%26;
		if(fib[i]%26==0)
		fib[i]=26;
	}
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		cout<<(char)(fib[i]+64);
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
